main_display: A central, glowing yellow Sun. An Earth model (blue/green sphere with distinct day/night sides) orbiting the Sun. A transparent elliptical orbit path. A dashed white line representing Earth's tilted axis, always pointing in the same direction in space. A light source emanating from the Sun illuminates half of the Earth, showing the day side (bright) and night side (dark).
animation_style: continuous and smooth for all movements (rotation, revolution, light changes). Stepped for axial tilt adjustments for clarity.
visual_metaphor: Imagine a spinning top (Earth) walking in a circle around a bright lamp (Sun). The top's tilt (Earth's axis) determines which part gets more light as it walks around.
